title: Digital Resource-Based Nursing Practice Education Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic nursing theories and practical clinical experience
context.additional_context: Online real-time education for practicing professionals, constructing digital resource-based learning environments using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners (nursing educators) can design three or more practical student evaluation processes using digital platforms.
Learners (nursing educators) can develop two or more communication systems among practical stakeholders (students-institutions-educators) using online collaboration tools.
Learners (nursing educators) can produce and apply one practical education scenario using digital simulation content.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
